author: brianp
msg: Only create a thread mutex with apr_file_open if the flags
include APR_XTHREAD.  (This keeps us from doing a mutex lock/unlock
on every read/write of a buffered file that's only used by a single

author: striker
msg: Factor out the allocators from pools.

as the functionality is just not there in 4.5, and cripples the api
